body:
Comment 12: 
I think you are right about the fact that things needs to change - I am more concerned
about closures. I just don't know how to implement it in such way that it is safe and
easy to use.

syscall.FreeCallback is too complicated. In fact, you don't need syscall.FreeCallback,
just remove code that keeps all windows callbacks in a list, and garbage collector will
pick them up.

Alex
